name: 3DFPS (Modified)
description:
This is the final version of my 3DFPS Project.

I made the following modifications:

1. Changed boss health and added a new boss.

2. Created new ways to use surroundings for varied mechanics.

3. Made the first level a horde mode that you have to escape from.

4. Added a couple of cosmetic differences.

Credits-

Ricky McKay
